import React from 'react' import { useContext, useState } from 'react'; import { authContext } from '../AuthProvider'; import './EnteredClass.css'; import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Avatar } from '@material-ui/core'; export const EnteredClass = (props) => { const location = useLocation(); let user = useContext(authContext); console.log(props); console.log(location); let [document,setdocument] = useState(null); let handlechosenfiles=(e)=>{ if(e.target.files[0]){ setdocument(e.target.files[0]); } } return ( <>
